twitch_info.title: I wanna kill the kamilia 3 v2.02 - The Journey to 100% (Beaten K3 v1.50 100%)

message.body: Happy New Year and GL! elcoch8CrimsonPog
oh shit didnt realize you beat emporer
you too and ty! :D
yeah I have, a while back now!
I clipped that elcoch8EmperorMiku
14th November 2025 is when I beat EX Emperor, Ubur!
it was beaten on stream too
ðŸ¤  ðŸ’ª
ty! long time no hear from you :o
gl CoolCat
ty! CoolCat
been stuck on ex air crystal for roughly 39 hours
forget how much is different in 2.0 compared to 1.5
yeah
4 golden crystals, 3 extra stage crystal, 3 ex m-stage crystals
ouka area, tomo area
jump achievements, shooting achievements
one hidden achievement in stage 3
gonna look up the extra stage crystals
ex prism, ex hope the end of and ex air
are the 3 extra stage crystals
prism is just type in "Kill the Kamilia" and hit enter
in the dialogue box
hope the end of has hidden spikes oof
after ex air I will have finished the extra stage crystals
I'll have stage 3 golden, stage 4 golden, ouka, tomo & ex m-stage left
after this
stage 4 golden is so much fun
definitely not horrible in any way
pretty sure everything I have left would be more fun than ex air crystal lol (except ex m-stage 3rd crystal and final)
good luck on the reserve gas
yeah I don't imagine it's worse than this, and it's like kinda fun but it's still like really dumb
ye fair
pluto ranked this as the 2nd hardest crystal, with number 1 being ex m-stage 3rd crystal and number 3 being guy tower crystal
the match checks out
as my time spent on ex air crystal is reaching the same as my guy tower crystal grind time lol
math*
i cant believe they let you retry the superFs
I'm glad they do lol
these super fs alone balloon the save difficulty
have you considered bhopping the super Ves?
ye it didn't really help much
I first try the jump randomly, and sometimes am consistent and other times not it's funny
I like 5f bhopping for super Ves because it also serves as a test jump
ye I get you
with my current technique I've managed to do this super f 7 times in a row in jtool
it's annoying how my consistency inreal runs is random but eh
I should try the test jump before doing the 2nd super f though cause that one I always struggle on
really not expecting to clear at this point, jsut going through the flow really
one day I'll get it lmao
playing bad needle be like
playing K3 be like
LUL
I have 1020 hours IGT (not including practice), I can complain this way
I've put way too many hours into this game
I feel like with the game in question many people can relate
true lmao
after putting this many hours into K3 I may as well do an any% run some day though
sunk cost fallacy amirite
jk but like I did want to do one anyway some point lol
I have 674 hours and I haven't even begun ex stage yet
oh wow
I was well into extra at that point if I remember
I always lose sight of my skill level lmao
@opanker_ Strongly relatable.
lol
oh yeah
I had 603 hours total game time
at the time I finished extra stage
+ 100 hours practice apparently
so 703 hours
well more like 704 hours cause of the 55 minutes + 43 minutes
so 704 hours total game + practice I was past extra stage
elcoch8Pog
so you're saying I could still beat ex stage faster than you...
wellllllll
LOL!!
just need to beat stage 4 golden, gravity man and all of ex stage in like 30 hours
I had also gotten every single crystal prior to clearing it and every other content prior to it including secret 5
G Man is fun
I had literally just extra content exclusively after extra stage
Eden Man FireSpeed
yeah I have almost everything else as well
oh wow so in theory then
you could maybe beat ex stage faster lol
only stage 4 golden and gravity man like I said
You got this mr. underscore
of course this was on v1.50 and v2.00 didn't exist back then
so you've done more requirements lol
you done ex air crystal already then?
no I haven't started ex stage
ahh
word of advice do not go for this crystal immediately, it's way harder than the rest of extra imo
Only thing demotivating me from 100% v1.50 (which is the way I plan to do it, altho not entirely sure), is doing Guy crystal. How in the world can I be consistent at the jump refreshers?
@ElCochran90 yeah time to lock in
The rest I'm 100% fine with, even Secret 5 and Tempest crystal. I already have the Emperor ones.
redire practice tool was how I spent time learning it, but the jump refreshers is rythm based
there's an input rhythm to follow
@Eradem Oh I didn't know this existed lol
ye it only exists for v1.50 lol
Based
@ElCochran90 I just played guy tower until I got comfortable at it and then got enough attempts to it to pass
@opanker_ Holy moly.
I always used practice tool on a separate save file
@opanker_ Guy Tower is not my concern itself, but the jump refreshers one.
@opanker_ I literally didn't let myself beat the save in the real game until I got the crystal lol
@Eradem #Determination
secret 5 is an experience I wouldn't wish on anyone lol
it feels like infinity
...trials?
KappaClaus
that's because it is
Ye ye
lmao yeah but it truly feels like it will never end during the grind
it's actually so bad
Ye ye I got you lol
me & mastermaxify even dreamed of beating it before actually beating it lol
I think I'm still "enjoying" that grind offline more than nailing the jump refreshers save at least ONCE
lol
I was ready to grind secret 5 for like 1000 hours and then I somehow second tried screen 9
the first and only time I had a fangame dream
Truly the incarnation of "make your dreams come true"
holy shit you got lucky with that second try screen 9
I beat it on my 9th attempt to get there
LUL
damn
79 hour grind in-game
think it was 80+ including jtool though
Holy moly
it's also extremely lucky because I sucked at secret 5, it took me 162 hours still
wow you took way longer than me to beat it, that would'[ve sucked even worse
That means: thank goodness he second tried screen 9 lol
no shit lmao
the galaxies aligned
I had 8 tries that failed, but only getting to it a second time at 162 hours utterly insane
fun-fact, I used to make a sound effect every time I reached the item, and it was the ONE run I did the same thing rather than only in practice that I got the clear lmao
it was the item get sound effect ofc
it didn't feel good not having it in practice
LUL
there was one person who spent like 100+ hours in secret 5 and then had so much fun they did it again from what I heard
I don't understand how anyone could but okay
secret 5 took over their brain
the infinity brain
sadly I wasn't very good at EX RZ and that took me 77 hours lol
though this was all back in 2021 now
I dunno what I was on but like
I beat secret 1 entrance in 2021 and then beat everything until EX Emperor in that same year???
then spent 3 years on ex emperor
absolutely bizzare
clearly secret 1 entrance was what was gatekeeping you
it was fr
tbh it's kind of a miracle, cause like the simon says bit was so hard for me
I had to record every single sound individually with video and play it back like 213808301 times
just to learn it lmao
damn that's a lot of times
well less than that but you know what I meant figuratively XD
I also did a funny
I remapped my arrow keys to wasd, used space to jump, and used right hand switch to space and D key when writing down the colours
on paper
only way I could do it
couldn't remember it so I just wrote it down quickly lmao
ended up filling an entire A4 sheet first page and most of a second page before clearing
what I did is I used numpad to have it hold right and then I only had to worry about jumping
this did result in me double koing twice however
my method was speedrun viable cause I could immediately switch my hands over to mouse and do the inputs with basically no wait time
still that area sucked lmao
gj getting past it
I followed opanker's advice with the numpad. I actually had never used the numpad before for anything and learned it for the first time this year lol
Also warned me about deactivating it because the kid doesn't stop, but I did die
ooooh that method
As for the colors, I never wrote anything down
that is a good numpad method now you mention it
yeah I also typically don't use numpad but like it's not like holding right is a particulary interesting challenge
I'd still need to remap my controls anyway tho cause of the minesweeper section
I used that trick for influka area as well to hold down shoot
so today is the super fs, yesterday was the diagonals, the day before that was the trap after the drop
slowly progressing where I keep dying XD
Progress is progress
aye
just been on this crystal for too long lol
yesterday I had 5 attempts almost get the crystal but none did, today I've had 2 the same way but prior to stream
I've had 4 total attempts die to super fs at the end with the crystal
one of them on the final super f
in my whole grind so far
by the way, make sure not to run into the last spike after the super f
oh I know, I was particularly worried about that so did some jtool earlier lol
the good news is any available spot with the align I'm using will let me full jump and full double jump to get past it
so I'm not tooo worried
spikes like that where you like brush against a wall can be deceptive
I did lose to it once in jtool, and only once
I remember being so shocked I died to in jtool lmao
fak
dang
good attempt
FallHalp
my 3rd time today getting so close to crystal
yesterday was 5 times and not get it lol
WTF
I've never made that mistake before LMFAO
Oh
Well, there's a first time for everything fragnaPoropride
this grind is one serious endurance lmao
on the bright side
~40 hours in so close to my guy tower crystal time of 42 hours
a
GetThatBread
mentally waiting for that crystal get sound at this point lol
doing ex air crystal feels lke waiting for all theodds to align
and until then it's just grind forever
gotta love my consistency sometimes
the super f just stops being a problem randomly
at this rate it'll be two grind sessions without grabbing crystal lol
Almost grabbed
ikr
otzBoop
lmao

cute emotes tho
absolute 10/10
Hello glhf
otzHugs
ty! :D
how have attempts been? otzFlower

no crystal yet tho
overall consistency is improving but it'sslow lmao
I hope this doesn't end up two days with 0 crystal grab
surely not otzCopium
okay ill stop xD
XD
For a moment I thought "wait, Eradem doesn't have emotes" I was confused af for a second
LUL
otzSmirk
okay so now that's my 5th time reaching the crystal jump and not getting the crystal this session. Matched my previous session consistency PB now.
in the same amount of grind time as last time roughly as well
so at least my consistency to getting to that jump is pretty good then
hopefully I actually get the darn crystal soon lol
tbf matching my grind consistency almost 1 to 1 to yesterday is pretty insane
due to 1 hour grind happening off-stream and me even banning a bot today like yesterday, there's no difference between today's grind and yesterday's grind now lol
other than not doing an off-stream hour last time
how the hell I managed to mirror yesterday's stream with today's stream I don't even
all I need now is one death to the top right spike before the crystal and all my deaths will have happened in the same places
minus the new one that happened today ofc
slowly approaching those 42 hours
welp 5th death to super fs with crystal
also that's my 2nd time reaching the final super f with crystal.
at least I got crystal at least ONCE today omg
really good attempt though, so close to clear but nope
still annoying it took 7-8 hours minimum to get the crystal again lol
I was consistently getting the crystal for quite a few streams at least a few times prior to this drought
Hey eradem, GL
ty!
almost
so out of 7 times 1 time got the crystal this stream so far
2 attempts were super close like that one
welp I should be at 42 hours now
harder than guy tower crystal confirmed
GL
shame but still 2nd crystal get of the day PogChamp
Yeah, GG on that!
ty! :D
Btw I never new that spike lowered so I thought when you got the crystal you had to go back through the crystal path, lol
lmao IMAGINE
you can't though
due to the spike layout you can't go back without dying
I checked in jtool unless there's some weird ass method
but yeah that would be dumb lol
I think I'm actually improving at the m-jump
that feels so weird to say
ye my hand is done for this grind today now, but that was a good like 5 hours grind of this save.
take care folks :D o/
Yeah, GG
Thanks for the stream! :D /
